reviews.review: I have this love/hate relationship with csgo. I don't remember how many times i dropped and play this game. also. got hackers if u ain't prime. even if u have still has one or so. copium if u get to knife them at arms race

esse jogo me trouxe angustia e sofrimento
I have strong and mixed feelings about this game.
great game, but there need to fix som things.

Personally not really my cup of tea. I prefer cartoony games like TF2 or overwatch, but still a good game and understandable why people like it. No downside if you choose to check it out cause it's free now, so give it a try :)
it is a fun game,i like it.
Ist jetzt nicht so geil. Also da habe ich definitiv schon besseres gespielt. Für Freunde von Shootern empfehle ich eher Call of Duty oder Battlefield als diesen Schmarrn hier.
not bad but there is a lot of sweats

Probably the best basic FPS of all time.
A game that you have to dedicate time to if you want to be even average. Once you grasp the mechanics of basic movement, and the spray control for the m4, ak, or krieg the game really becomes fun.
macht schon eh wenk bock wenn man das en bissche spielt aber die ganzen russen fucken ab wie sau

Jeszcze gdy chodziłem do podstawówki, to był tam taki Paweł, i ja jechałem na rowerze, i go spotkałem, i potem jeszcze pojechałem do biedronki na lody, i po drodze do domu wtedy jeszcze, już do domu pojechałem
Um dos melhores jogos de FPS que eu já joguei?!
